survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Contactless Banking Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate customer satisfaction with contactless banking services, including mobile check deposits, digital wallet usage, and online banking features.

questions.question_text: How often do you use contactless banking services (e.g., mobile check deposits, digital wallets, online transfers)?
questions.routing_logic: This question is shown to all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. Ensure mobile-friendly design.

script.question_text: How often do you use contactless banking services (e.g., mobile check deposits, digital wallets, online transfers)?
script.routing_logic: This question is shown to all respondents.

questions.question_text: Which of the following contactless banking features have you used in the past 6 months? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Digital wallet (e.g., Apple Pay, Google Pay)
questions.routing_logic: This question is shown to all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Use multi-choice checkboxes. Ensure options are clearly distinct.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the ease of using your bank's contactless banking services?

questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency. Avoid neutral bias.
